name: Brandfetch Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Brandfetch Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Brandfetch API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Brandfetch API | (必填项)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: logo
available_options: Color (值: color) - Return a company's colors
Company (值: company) - Return a company's data
Font (值: font) - Return a company's fonts
Industry (值: industry) - Return a company's industry
Logo (值: logo) - Return a company's logo & icon

domain.name: domain
domain.description: The domain name of the company
domain.natural_language_description: 参数名: Domain | 作用: The domain name of the company | (必填项)

download.name: download
download.description: Name of the binary property to which to write the data of the read file
download.natural_language_description: 参数名: Download | 作用: Name of the binary property to which to write the data of the read file | 默认值: False | (必填项)

imageTypes.name: imageTypes
imageTypes.natural_language_description: 参数名: Image Type | 默认值: ['logo', 'icon'] | (必填项)

imageFormats.name: imageFormats
imageFormats.description: The image format in which the logo should be returned as
imageFormats.natural_language_description: 参数名: Image Format | 作用: The image format in which the logo should be returned as | 默认值: ['png'] | (必填项)
